表：CREATE TABLE geometries
(
  name character varying,
  geom geometry
)
插入的数据：
INSERT INTO geometries VALUES 
 ('Polygon', 'POLYGON((39.92867658006186 116.32890777248767,39.92874081731943 116.32890777389355,39.928805054577 116.32890777529943,39.92886929183456 116.32890777670532,39.92893352909212 116.32883288920564,39.92867658006186 116))')
